alert.note: Alert for Washington (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 10:11PM CDT until August 02 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR WASHINGTON COUNTY... At 1010 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Richwoods to 8 miles west of Old Mines to near Anthonies Mill, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Potosi, Anthonies Mill, Irondale, Mineral Point, Old Mines, Richwoods, Courtois, Caledonia, Belgrade, Latty, Cadet, and Shirley. This also includes Washington State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
